General.Name: Beijing HuaYuanYiTong Thermal Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Jingneng Thermal Co., Ltd. engages in the heating business in China. It is involved in heat supply project investment, heat supply management right acquisition, heat supply trusteeship operation, contract energy management, and energy-saving technology research and development activities, as well as provides heating management consulting services. The company was formerly known as Beijing Huayuanyitong Thermal Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Jingneng Thermal Co., Ltd. in April 2023. Beijing Jingneng Thermal Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
